channel.title: [508 Espion help] help changing a few things apon login
channel.description: ok heres what it says when you log in, I'll just say all, [code](admincrown)[Welcome to epicscape] (admincrown) *******.net [/code] I looked in, RS2Loginprotocol(aka login.java i think). action sender, and lots of others, this is espion source, and can't seem to find it, any one help me out? thanks ;D

item.title: [508 Espion help] help changing a few things apon login
item.dc:creator: @poopy1234 poopy1234
item.description:
@poopy1234 wrote:

ok i found it, espeon is weird from the other 508 source, it was in TestWorldLoader, if anyone was reading this and had same problem, thanks Hidendra ;D

Read full topic

item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

poopy1234:

[quote]root source dir?

Sorry didn’t follow you there, just started 508’s from delta’s lol sorta new, can you put that in laymen terms?[/quote]
the directory where all the source files are. doing it just in the espeon folder would probably work as fine.

item.title: [508 Espion help] help changing a few things apon login
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Personally I’ve never used espeon so I’m not going to give you an exact answer. Go to the root source dir, ctrl + f, click search in directories and files if it asks for in what, and in the “A word or phrase in the file” input box place a word or two from what it says.

Read full topic
